resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76138</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76138</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>0865558f-cb6a-4f3a-8313-903eba0db447#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az ékírás</string>
            <string language="en">The cuneiform</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das keilförmige</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cunéiforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O cuneiform</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cuneiform</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σφηνοειδής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cuneiforme</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ékírás bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Presenting the cuneiform</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">sumer városok,  sumerok,  akkádok,  Asszíria,  Folyamvölgy,  Ur,  Uruk,  Assur,  Ninive,  Szúza,  Mári,  Óbabiloni Birodalom,  Babilónia,  Eufrátesz,  Tigris,  Képírás,  agyagtábla,  </string>
            <string language="en">Sumerian cities,  the Sumerians,  Akkads,  Assyria,  river valley,  Ur,  Uruk,  Assur,  Niniveh,  Szúza,  Mari,  Old Babylonian Empire,  Babylonia,  Euphrates,  Tigris,  pictography,  clay tablet,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellen das keilförmige</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation du cunéiforme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentando o cuneiform</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentare il cuneiform</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση το σφηνοειδούς</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación del cuneiforme</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sumerische Städte, das Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, 
River Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, altes Babylonian
Reich, Babylonia, Euphrat, Tigris, pictography, Lehmtablette,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Villes sumériennes, le Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, 
River Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, vieil empire 
babylonien, Babylonia, Euphrate, Tigre, pictography, tablette 
d'argile,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cidades sumerian, o Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, River 
Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, império babylonian 
velho, Babylonia, Euphrates, Tigris, pictography, tabuleta da argila,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Città sumeriche, il Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, River 
Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, vecchio impero 
babylonian, Babylonia, Euphrates, Tigris, pictography, ridurre in pani
dell'argilla,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sumerian πόλεις, το Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, 
κοιλάδα ποταμών, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szϊza, 
Μάρι, παλαιά Babylonian αυτοκρατορία, Babylonia, Εφράτης, 
Τίγρης, εικονόγραμμα, ταμπλέτα αργίλου,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudades sumerias, el Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, River
Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, viejo imperio 
babilónico, Babylonia, Euphrates, Tigris, pictography, tablilla de la
arcilla,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Veszprémi Egyetem
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76138</entry>
